trans-unit.source: E-mail address is already in use

trans-unit.target: Yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i Stripe gael ei gysylltu i gyflawni'r weithred hon

trans-unit.source: Performance cannot be deleted while currently live
trans-unit.target: Ni ellir dileu perfformiad wrth fyw ar hyn o bryd

trans-unit.source: Performance cannot be deleted after it has occured
trans-unit.target: Ni ellir dileu perfformiad ar ôl iddo ddigwydd

trans-unit.source: Performance cannot be cancelled while currently live
trans-unit.target: Ni ellir canslo perfformiad tra’n fyw ar hyn o bryd

trans-unit.source: Performance cannot be cancelled after it has occured
trans-unit.target: Ni ellir canslo perfformiad ar ôl iddo ddigwydd

trans-unit.target: Nid oes gennych ganiatâd i weld y cynnwys hwn

trans-unit.source: You have too many thumbnails, try deleting some before uploading new ones
trans-unit.target: Mae gennych ormod o fawd, ceisiwch ddileu rhai cyn uwchlwytho rhai newydd

trans-unit.source: Cannot set performance publicity period outside one of the tickets selling period
trans-unit.target: Ni all osod cyfnod cyhoeddusrwydd perfformiad y tu allan i un o'r cyfnod gwerthu tocynnau

trans-unit.source: You are already following this host
trans-unit.target: Rydych chi eisoes yn dilyn y gwesteiwr hwn

trans-unit.source: The provided rate value is invalid
trans-unit.target: Mae'r gwerth cyfradd a ddarperir yn annilys
Methu dod o hyd i'r sgôr bresennol

trans-unit.source: Self-certification of streaming license compliance not made. Please tick the box when creating a performance
trans-unit.target: Ni wnaed hunan-ardystiad o gydymffurfiad trwydded ffrydio. Ticiwch y blwch wrth greu perfformiad

trans-unit.source: Received response does not match submitter!
trans-unit.target: Nid yw'r ymateb a dderbynnir yn cyfateb i'r cyflwynydd!
Methu dod o hyd i unrhyw anfonebau

trans-unit.source: Cannot refund while another refund is already outstanding
trans-unit.target: Ni ellir ad-dalu tra bo ad-daliad ei gilydd eisoes yn ddyledus
Rwy'n cael e-byst yn rhy aml.

trans-unit.source: The content isn’t relevant to me.
trans-unit.target: Nid yw'r cynnwys yn berthnasol i mi.

trans-unit.source: I never signed up, or I didn’t realize that I have signed up.
trans-unit.target: Wnes i erioed arwyddo, neu wnes i ddim sylweddoli fy mod i wedi arwyddo.

source.p: This is a notification to confirm that {host_name} has initiated a refund on your order {invoice_id} for the amount of {invoice_amount} for the performance {performance_name}.
You can view the status of this refund at any time by logging in to your StageUp account and clicking settings -> payments.
We will automatically credit the funds to your {card_brand} ending in {last_4}. Please note, the amount may take up to 5 working days to appear in your account.

trans-unit.target:
** Hi {user_username}, **
Mae hwn yn hysbysiad i gadarnhau bod ** {host_name} ** wedi cychwyn ad-daliad ar eich archeb ** {invoice_id} ** am y swm o ** {invoice_amount} ** ar gyfer y perfformiad ** {performance_name} **.
Gallwch weld statws yr ad-daliad hwn ar unrhyw adeg trwy fewngofnodi i'ch cyfrif StageUp a chlicio gosodiadau -> taliadau.
Byddwn yn credydu'r arian yn awtomatig i'ch ** {card_brand} ** sy'n gorffen yn ** {last_4} **. Sylwch, gall y swm gymryd hyd at 5 diwrnod gwaith i ymddangos yn eich cyfrif.
** Diolch, **
** Tîm StageUp **
Ad-daliad a gychwynnwyd gan {host_name} ar gyfer {performance_name}

source.p: You have initiated a refund for your performance “{performance_name}”
We have notified the affected customer that they shall receive the refunded amount in their account within 5 working days
Please note, if this request was not initated by you please notify us immediately

trans-unit.target:
** Hi {host_name}, **
Rydych wedi cychwyn ad-daliad am eich perfformiad "{performance_name}"
** Anfoneb #: {invoice_id} **
** Cyfanswm Swm: {invoice_amount} **
Rydym wedi hysbysu'r cwsmer yr effeithir arno y bydd yn derbyn y swm a ad-dalwyd yn ei gyfrif cyn pen 5 diwrnod gwaith
** Diolch, **
** Tîm StageUp **
Sylwch, os na chychwynnwyd y cais hwn gennych chi, rhowch wybod i ni ar unwaith
Cychwynnwyd ad-daliad ar gyfer pryniant {user_username} o {performance_name}

trans-unit.source: You have initiated refunds for {refund_quantity} invoice(s)
trans-unit.target: Rydych wedi cychwyn ad-daliadau ar gyfer anfoneb (ion) {refund_quantity}

source.p: You have initiated refunds for {refund_quantity} invoices
Total value: {invoices_total}
We have notified the affected customers that they shall receive the refunded amount in their accounts within 5 working days
Please note, if this request was not initated by you please notify us immediately"

trans-unit.target:
** Hi {host_name}, **
Rydych wedi cychwyn ad-daliadau ar gyfer anfonebau {refund_quantity}
** Cyfanswm gwerth: ** {invoices_total} **
Rydym wedi hysbysu'r cwsmeriaid yr effeithir arnynt y byddant yn derbyn y swm a ad-dalwyd yn eu cyfrifon cyn pen 5 diwrnod gwaith
** Diolch, **
** Tîm StageUp **
Sylwch, os na chychwynnwyd y cais hwn gennych chi, rhowch wybod i ni ar unwaith "

source.p: Hi {user_username},
This is a notification to confirm that {host_name} has successfully refunded your order {invoice_id} for {invoice_amount} for your purchase of {performance_name} due to:
The funds have now been credited to {card_brand} ending in {last_4}. You can view a log of this refund within your StageUp account settings

trans-unit.target:
Helo {user_username},
Mae hwn yn hysbysiad i gadarnhau bod {host_name} wedi ad-dalu'ch archeb yn llwyddiannus ** {invoice_id} ** ar gyfer ** {invoice_amount} ** am eich pryniant o ** {performance_name} ** oherwydd:
> {refund_reason}
Mae'r cronfeydd bellach wedi'u credydu i ** {card_brand} ** sy'n gorffen yn ** {last_4} **.
Gallwch weld log o'r ad-daliad hwn yn eich gosodiadau cyfrif StageUp
** Diolch, **
** Tîm StageUp **
Ad-daliad ar gyfer {user_username} ar gyfer {performance_name} (ID: {invoice_id}), wedi'i brosesu'n llwyddiannus gan Stripe

source.p: Hi {host_name},

This is a notification to confirm that your recent refund request for {user_username} for {performance_name} for the amount of {invoice_amount} has succesfully been refunded by Stripe and the user has been notified.
You can view the status of all your refunds within your account settings

trans-unit.target:
Helo {host_name},
Mae hwn yn hysbysiad i gadarnhau bod eich cais am ad-daliad diweddar am ** {user_username} ** ar gyfer ** {performance_name} ** am y swm o ** {invoice_amount} ** wedi'i ad-dalu'n llwyddiannus gan Stripe ac mae'r defnyddiwr wedi'i hysbysu.
Gallwch weld statws eich holl ad-daliadau o fewn gosodiadau eich cyfrif
** Diolch, ** ** Tîm StageUp **

trans-unit.source: StageUp: Your refund request has been sent to @{host_name}
trans-unit.target: StageUp: Mae eich cais am ad-daliad wedi'i anfon at @{host_name}

source.p: Your refund request for the following invoice has been sent to {host_name}.
We’ll let you know when the host has processed your request

trans-unit.target:
Mae eich cais am ad-daliad am yr anfoneb ganlynol wedi'i anfon at ** {host_name} **.
- Anfoneb #: ** {invoice_id} ** - Perfformiad: ** {performance_name} ** - Prynwyd: ** {purchase_date} ** - Swm: ** {amount} **
Byddwn yn rhoi gwybod ichi pan fydd y gwesteiwr wedi prosesu'ch cais
** Diolch, **
** Tîm StageUp **

trans-unit.source: StageUp: Refund request received for {performance_name} from @{user_username}
trans-unit.target: StageUp: Derbyniwyd cais am ad-daliad am {performance_name} gan @{user_username}

source.p: Hi {host_name},
@{user_username} ({user_email_address}) has requested a refund on their purchase of {performance_name}
To process this request you can visit your invoice dashboard here.

trans-unit.target: Gweler yr atodiadau am ddata anfoneb
Gweler yr atodiadau am ddata anfoneb

trans-unit.source: You have been invited to join {host_name} by {inviter_name}
trans-unit.target: Fe'ch gwahoddwyd i ymuno â {host_name} gan {inviter_name}

source.p: Hi {user_name},
Click the link to accept the invitation: {url}, this invite will expire in 24 hours.

trans-unit.target: Helo {user_name}, Cliciwch y ddolen i dderbyn y gwahoddiad: < {url}>, bydd y gwahoddiad hwn yn dod i ben mewn ** 24 awr **.

trans-unit.source: You have been invited to watch a private performance
trans-unit.target: Fe'ch gwahoddwyd i wylio perfformiad preifat

source.p: Hi {user_name},
Click the link to watch {performance_name} by {host_name} on StageUp now: {url}>

trans-unit.target: Helo {user_name}, Cliciwch y ddolen i wylio ** {performance_name} ** gan ** {host_name} ** ar StageUp nawr: < {url} >>

source.p: Hi {user_name},
Thank you for supporting {host_name}!
Your patron payments of {amount} will be debited on {date_ordinal} of each month, starting today.
You can cancel your payments at any time. By making this payment you agree to StageUp’s Terms of Use
Thanks, StageUp Team

trans-unit.target:
Helo {user_name}, Diolch am gefnogi ** {host_name} **!
Bydd eich taliadau noddwr o {amount} yn cael eu debydu ar {date_ordinal} bob mis, gan ddechrau heddiw.
Gallwch ganslo'ch taliadau ar unrhyw adeg. Trwy wneud y taliad hwn rydych chi'n cytuno i [Telerau Defnyddio StageUp] ({tos_url}) Diolch, Tîm StageUp

source.p: Hi {host_name},
@{user_username} is now a patron of your company.

trans-unit.target:
Helo ** {host_name} **,
Mae @{user_username} bellach yn noddwr i'ch cwmni.
- Haen Noddwyr: ** {tier_name} ** - Swm: ** {amount} **

source.p: Hi {user_name},
You are receiving this because you (or someone else) has requested the reset of the password for your StageUp account.
Please click on the following link to complete the process. This link is valid for the next 24 hours.
If you did not request this change, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

trans-unit.target:
Helo ** {user_name} **, Rydych chi'n derbyn hwn oherwydd eich bod chi (neu rywun arall) wedi gofyn am ailosod y cyfrinair ar gyfer eich cyfrif StageUp.
Cliciwch ar y ddolen ganlynol i gwblhau'r broses. Mae'r ddolen hon yn ddilys am y 24 awr nesaf.
< {password_reset_url}>
Os na ofynasoch am y newid hwn, anwybyddwch yr e-bost hwn a bydd eich cyfrinair yn aros yr un fath.

trans-unit.source: Your StageUp password was just changed
trans-unit.target: Newidiwyd eich cyfrinair StageUp yn unig

source.p: Your StageUp account password has recently been changed.
If you did not make this change, please login into your account and change your password as soon as possible.
If you have recently changed your password, then please ignore this

trans-unit.target:
Newidiwyd cyfrinair eich cyfrif StageUp yn ddiweddar. Os na wnaethoch y newid hwn, mewngofnodwch i'ch cyfrif a newid eich cyfrinair cyn gynted â phosibl.
Os ydych chi wedi newid eich cyfrinair yn ddiweddar, yna anwybyddwch yr e-bost hwn.

source.p: Hi @{user_username},

@{host_username} has deleted/removed the {tier_name} tier. We have cancelled your current subscription ({sub_id}). It will come into effect immediately. You’ll recieve and e-mail shortly confirming the un-subscription.
Thanks, StageUp

trans-unit.target:
Helo ** @{user_username} **,
Mae ** @{host_username} ** wedi dileu / dileu'r haen ** {tier_name} **. Rydym wedi canslo'ch tanysgrifiad cyfredol ({sub_id}). Daw i rym ar unwaith. Byddwch yn derbyn ac yn e-bostio cyn bo hir yn cadarnhau'r tanysgrifiad.
Diolch, StageUp

source.p: Hi @{user_username},
This is a receipt of your un-subscription from @{host_username}'s patron tier, {tier_name}.
You’ll no longer be charged for this subscription & this subscription will be listed as ‘Cancelled’ on your account from now on.
Thanks, StageUp

trans-unit.target:
Helo @{user_username},
Dyma dderbynneb o'ch tanysgrifiad gan haen noddwr ** @{host_username} **, ** {tier_name} **. Ni chodir tâl arnoch mwyach am y tanysgrifiad hwn & bydd y tanysgrifiad hwn yn cael ei restru fel 'Canslo' ar eich cyfrif o hyn ymlaen.
Diolch, StageUp
Ni ddaethpwyd o hyd i'r llwybr
Mae gwerth eisoes yn cael ei ddefnyddio

You purchased a {ticket_name} to watch {performance_name} for {amount}.
Receipt of this purchase: {receipt_url}

target.p: Helo {user_name},
Fe wnaethoch chi brynu {ticket_name} i wylio {performance_name} ar gyfer {amount}.
Cliciwch yma i wylio: {url} Derbyn y pryniant hwn: {receipt_url}

source.p: Hello {user_name},

You purchased tickets for {performance_name} for {amount}. It will premier on {publicity_period_start}. Don’t forget to mark your calendar. We’ll send you reminders closer to the time, so you don’t miss it. :)
Receipt of this purchase: {receipt_url}
Cheers,
StageUp Team

target.p: Helo {user_name},

Fe wnaethoch chi brynu tocynnau ar gyfer {performance_name} ar gyfer {amount}. Bydd yn dangos am y tro cyntaf ar {premier_time}. Peidiwch ag anghofio marcio'ch calender. Byddwn yn anfon nodiadau atgoffa atoch yn agos at y dyddiad, felly ni fyddwch yn ei golli. :)
Derbyn y pryniant hwn: {receipt_url} Ewch â mi i'm llyfrgell: {url}
Lloniannau,
Tîm StagUp

source.p: Hi {user_name},

source.p: Hi {user_name},

Please click on the following link to complete the process. This link is valid for the next 24 hours.
If you did not request this change, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

target.p: Helo {user_name} ,
Rydych chi'n derbyn hwn oherwydd eich bod chi (neu rywun arall) wedi gofyn am ailosod y cyfrinair ar gyfer eich cyfrif StageUp.
Cliciwch ar y ddolen ganlynol i gwblhau'r broses. Mae'r ddolen hon yn ddilys am y 24 awr nesaf.
Os na ofynasoch am y newid hwn, anwybyddwch yr e-bost hwn a bydd eich cyfrinair yn aros yr un fath.

trans-unit.source: Your StageUp password was just changed
trans-unit.target: Newidiwyd eich cyfrinair StageUp yn unig

source.p: Your StageUp account password has recently been changed.
If you did not make this change, please login into your account and change your password as soon as possible.
If you have recently changed your password, then please ignore this

target.p: Newidiwyd cyfrinair eich cyfrif StageUp yn ddiweddar.
Os na wnaethoch y newid hwn, mewngofnodwch i'ch cyfrif a newid eich cyfrinair cyn gynted â phosibl.
Os ydych chi wedi newid eich cyfrinair yn ddiweddar, yna anwybyddwch hyn

source.p: Hi @{user_username},

@{host_username} has deleted/removed the {tier_name} tier. We have cancelled your current subscription ({sub_id}). It will come into effect immediately. You’ll recieve and e-mail shortly confirming the un-subscription.
Thanks, StageUp

target.p: Helo @{user_username} ,

Mae @{host_username} wedi dileu / dileu haen {tier_name}. Rydym wedi canslo'ch tanysgrifiad cyfredol ({sub_id}). Daw i rym ar unwaith. Byddwch yn derbyn ac yn e-bostio cyn bo hir yn cadarnhau'r tanysgrifiad.
Diolch, StageUp

source.p: Hi @{user_username},
This is a receipt of your un-subscription from @{host_username}'s patron tier, {tier_name}.
You’ll no longer be charged for this subscription & this subscription will be listed as ‘Cancelled’ on your account from now on.
Thanks, StageUp

target.p: Helo @{user_username},
Dyma dderbynneb o'ch tanysgrifiad gan haen noddwr @{host_username} , {tier_name} .
Ni chodir tâl arnoch am y tanysgrifiad hwn mwyach a bydd y tanysgrifiad hwn yn cael ei restru fel 'Canslo' ar eich cyfrif o hyn ymlaen.
Diolch, StageUp

source.p: Hello {user_username}!
You purchased tickets for {performance_name}. It will premiere tomorrow on {premier_time}.
We’re looking forward seeing you on StageUp!
Cheers,
StageUp team

target.p: Helo {user_username}!
Fe wnaethoch chi brynu tocynnau ar gyfer {performance_name}. Bydd yn cael ei ddangos am y tro cyntaf yfory yn {premier_time}.
Gobeithio eich bod chi'n cynhyrfu i'w wylio.
Lloniannau,
Tîm StageUp

source.p: Hello {user_username}!
You purchased tickets for {performance_name}. It will start at {premier_time}.
We hope you’re all set to watch it!
Cheers,
StageUp team

target.p: Helo {user_username}!
Fe wnaethoch chi brynu tocynnau ar gyfer {performance_name}. Bydd yn cychwyn yn {premier_time}.
Gobeithio eich bod chi i gyd yn barod i'w wylio!
Ewch â mi i'm llyfrgell: {url}
Lloniannau,
Tîm StageUp

source.p: Hello {host_name},
You have cancelled your performance: {performance_name} which was scheduled on {performance_premiere_date}
We have initiated refunds to all customers who purchased tickets to this event. Funds will be credited into their accounts within 5 working days.
Thanks,

target.p: Helo {host_name} ,
Rydych wedi canslo eich perfformiad: {performance_name} a drefnwyd ar {performance_premiere_date}
Rydym wedi cychwyn ad-daliadau i'r holl gwsmeriaid a brynodd docynnau i'r digwyddiad hwn. Bydd cronfeydd yn cael eu credydu i'w cyfrifon cyn pen 5 diwrnod gwaith.
Diolch,

source.p: Hello {host_name},
You have deleted your performance: {performance_name} which was scheduled on {performance_premiere_date}
We have initiated refunds to all customers who purchased tickets to this event. Funds will be credited into their accounts within 5 working days.
Thanks,

target.p: Helo {host_name} ,
Rydych wedi dileu eich perfformiad: {performance_name} a drefnwyd ar {performance_premiere_date}
Rydym wedi cychwyn ad-daliadau i'r holl gwsmeriaid a brynodd docynnau i'r digwyddiad hwn. Bydd cronfeydd yn cael eu credydu i'w cyfrifon cyn pen 5 diwrnod gwaith.
Diolch,

source.p: Hi {user_username},
Unfortunately, {host_name} has had to cancel the performance: {performance_name}. We have initiated a refund on your ticket purchased on {ticket_purchase_date}.
Invoice#: {invoice_id}
Ticket Price: {ticket_amount}
We will automatically credit the funds to your {card_brand} ending in {last_4}. Please note, it may take up to 5 working days for your account to be credited.
Thanks,

target.p: Helo {user_username} ,
Yn anffodus, bu'n rhaid i {host_name} ganslo'r perfformiad: {performance_name}. Rydym wedi cychwyn ad-daliad ar eich tocyn a brynwyd ar {ticket_purchase_date}.
Anfoneb #: {invoice_id}
Pris y Tocyn: {ticket_amount}
Byddwn yn credydu'r arian yn awtomatig i'ch {card_brand} sy'n dod i ben yn {last_4} . Sylwch, gall gymryd hyd at 5 diwrnod gwaith i'ch cyfrif gael ei gredydu.
Diolch,

trans-unit.source: A new user has consented to marketing
trans-unit.target: Mae defnyddiwr newydd wedi cydsynio i farchnata

source.p: Hi {host_name},
You have a new user who has consented to receiving marketing from you!
Username: {user_name} Email: {user_email}
Please add them to your marketing communications. We will inform you again if the user chooses to opt out of marketing in the future.
Thanks,

target.p: Helo {host_name} ,
Mae gennych chi ddefnyddiwr newydd sydd wedi cydsynio i dderbyn marchnata gennych chi!
Enw defnyddiwr: {user_name} E-bost: {user_email}
Gallwch eu hychwanegu at eich rhestr bostio. Byddwn yn eich hysbysu eto os bydd y defnyddiwr yn dewis optio allan o farchnata yn y dyfodol.
Diolch,

trans-unit.source: A user has opted out of marketing
trans-unit.target: Mae defnyddiwr wedi optio allan o farchnata

source.p: Hello,
Your subscriber {user_name} ({user_email}) has opted out of receiving direct emails from your organisation. Additional information:
Reason: {opt_out_reason} Message: {opt_out_message}
Kindly remove them from your mailing list. We will inform you again by email if they choose to opt back in.
Thanks,

target.p: Helo,
Mae eich tanysgrifiwr {user_name} ({user_email}) wedi dewis peidio â derbyn e-byst uniongyrchol gan eich sefydliad. Darparwyd y wybodaeth hon:
Rheswm: {opt_out_reason} Neges: {opt_out_message}
Yn garedig, tynnwch nhw oddi ar eich rhestr bostio. Byddwn yn eich hysbysu eto trwy e-bost os byddant yn dewis optio i mewn.
Diolch,

trans-unit.target: Mae gwerth eisoes yn cael ei ddefnyddio

trans-unit.source: Must be logged in to perform this action
trans-unit.target: Rhaid mewngofnodi i gyflawni'r weithred hon

trans-unit.source: Must be a Site Admin to perform this action
trans-unit.target: Rhaid bod yn Weinyddwr Safle i gyflawni'r weithred hon

trans-unit.source: Missing a field in the provided data
trans-unit.target: Ar goll maes yn y data a ddarperir

trans-unit.source: Your account must be verified to perform this action
trans-unit.target: Rhaid gwirio'ch cyfrif i gyflawni'r weithred hon

trans-unit.source: Not a valid HMRC Company number
trans-unit.target: Ddim yn rhif Cwmni Cyllid a Thollau EM dilys
Ddim yn URL dilys ar Facebook
